We’re a homebuilding platform that places customers at the centre, surrounded by the best architects, engineers, and builders.

When people are making one of the biggest decisions of their lives—building a home—there’s a lot at stake. Especially when the process can be stressful and full of hiccups. Haaven is here to change this. Our platform brings together all the right skills from architects, prefabricated home builders and contractors to help you bring your home to life. These professionals are vetted, experienced and trusted. We also help you manage your budget and timeline so there are no surprises. Haaven understands the stress in building spaces and work relentlessly to make the experience the best it can be for everyone involved.
